<a id="class_CodeHighlighter"></a>

# CodeHighlighter

**Inherits:** [SyntaxHighlighter](class_syntaxhighlighter.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A syntax highlighter intended for code.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

By adjusting various properties of this resource, you can change the colors of strings, comments, numbers, and other text patterns inside a [TextEdit](class_textedit.md) control.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_property_color_regions"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **color_regions** = `{}` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_property_color_regions)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color_regions**\ (\ value\: [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\ )
- [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **get_color_regions**\ (\ )

Sets the color regions. All existing regions will be removed. The [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) key is the region start and end key, separated by a space. The value is the region color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_property_function_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](class_color.md) **function_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_property_function_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_function_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](class_color.md)\ )
- [Color](class_color.md) **get_function_color**\ (\ )

Sets color for functions. A function is a non-keyword string followed by a '('.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_property_keyword_colors"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **keyword_colors** = `{}` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_property_keyword_colors)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_keyword_colors**\ (\ value\: [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\ )
- [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **get_keyword_colors**\ (\ )

Sets the keyword colors. All existing keywords will be removed. The [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) key is the keyword. The value is the keyword color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_property_member_keyword_colors"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **member_keyword_colors** = `{}` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_property_member_keyword_colors)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_member_keyword_colors**\ (\ value\: [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\ )
- [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **get_member_keyword_colors**\ (\ )

Sets the member keyword colors. All existing member keyword will be removed. The [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) key is the member keyword. The value is the member keyword color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_property_member_variable_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](class_color.md) **member_variable_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_property_member_variable_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_member_variable_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](class_color.md)\ )
- [Color](class_color.md) **get_member_variable_color**\ (\ )

Sets color for member variables. A member variable is non-keyword, non-function string proceeded with a '.'.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_property_number_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](class_color.md) **number_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_property_number_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_number_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](class_color.md)\ )
- [Color](class_color.md) **get_number_color**\ (\ )

Sets the color for numbers.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_property_symbol_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](class_color.md) **symbol_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_property_symbol_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_symbol_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](class_color.md)\ )
- [Color](class_color.md) **get_symbol_color**\ (\ )

Sets the color for symbols.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_add_color_region"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_color_region**\ (\ start_key\: [String](class_string.md), end_key\: [String](class_string.md), color\: [Color](class_color.md), line_only\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_add_color_region)

Adds a color region (such as for comments or strings) from `start_key` to `end_key`. Both keys should be symbols, and `start_key` must not be shared with other delimiters.

If `line_only` is ``true`` or `end_key` is an empty [String](class_string.md), the region does not carry over to the next line.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_add_keyword_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_keyword_color**\ (\ keyword\: [String](class_string.md), color\: [Color](class_color.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_add_keyword_color)

Sets the color for a keyword.

The keyword cannot contain any symbols except '\_'.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_add_member_keyword_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_member_keyword_color**\ (\ member_keyword\: [String](class_string.md), color\: [Color](class_color.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_add_member_keyword_color)

Sets the color for a member keyword.

The member keyword cannot contain any symbols except '\_'.

It will not be highlighted if preceded by a '.'.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_clear_color_regions"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_color_regions**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_clear_color_regions)

Removes all color regions.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_clear_keyword_colors"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_keyword_colors**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_clear_keyword_colors)

Removes all keywords.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_clear_member_keyword_colors"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_member_keyword_colors**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_clear_member_keyword_colors)

Removes all member keywords.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_get_keyword_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Color](class_color.md) **get_keyword_color**\ (\ keyword\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_get_keyword_color)

Returns the color for a keyword.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_get_member_keyword_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Color](class_color.md) **get_member_keyword_color**\ (\ member_keyword\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_get_member_keyword_color)

Returns the color for a member keyword.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_has_color_region"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **has_color_region**\ (\ start_key\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_has_color_region)

Returns ``true`` if the start key exists, else ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_has_keyword_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **has_keyword_color**\ (\ keyword\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_has_keyword_color)

Returns ``true`` if the keyword exists, else ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_has_member_keyword_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **has_member_keyword_color**\ (\ member_keyword\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_has_member_keyword_color)

Returns ``true`` if the member keyword exists, else ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_remove_color_region"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_color_region**\ (\ start_key\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_remove_color_region)

Removes the color region that uses that start key.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_remove_keyword_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_keyword_color**\ (\ keyword\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_remove_keyword_color)

Removes the keyword.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeHighlighter_method_remove_member_keyword_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_member_keyword_color**\ (\ member_keyword\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeHighlighter_method_remove_member_keyword_color)

Removes the member keyword.
